TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader

Docs.summary: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence">.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to obtain a reference to an object that implements this interface.
[!code-cs[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/XpsReadWriteSign/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/xpsreadwritesign/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]
The following example shows how to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> in order to access <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
[!code-vb[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/documentstructure/window1.xaml.vb#docstrucfixeddoc)] [!code-cs[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/DocumentStructure/Window1.xaml.cs#docstrucfixeddoc)]

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> readers for each document in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
Docs.value: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> readers, one for each document in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the FixedDocuments property to obtain a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> readers.
[!code-vb[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/documentstructure/window1.xaml.vb#docstrucfixeddoc)] [!code-cs[DocumentStructure#DocStrucFixedDoc](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/DocumentStructure/Window1.xaml.cs#docstrucfixeddoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader GetFixedDocument(class System.Uri documentSource) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a reader for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket">, if one exists, that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> that contains the default printing options for the sequence; or `null`, if no print ticket exists for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] sequence, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

Docs.summary: Gets the thumbnail image, if one exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence">.

Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the sequence.
